extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Disable Insecure Login in Single User Mode
extensionAttribute.description: This extension attribute template will ensure that the /etc/ttys config file is set to disable insecure single user signon.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh lookFor="insecure" result=`cat /etc/ttys | grep "$lookFor" | tail -1` if [ "$result" == "$lookFor" ]; then echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Pass (No secure sign-on prefs found.)</result>" fi
